text: Serendib competed at the 2019 Special Olympics World Summer Games in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates from 14 to 21 March 2019. This was Sri Lanka's third participation at the Special Olympics World Summer Games since making its debut at the 2011 Special Olympics World Summer Games. 20 athletes competed at the multi-sporting event in 5 different sports. Serendib clinched 4 medals at the event including 2 gold medals and 2 silver medals.
